title: Looking for Team Ranked    PLays
body:
Hello i am a silver i Oceania, i want to get a bit more serious in team ranked. If you want to play either send me an email at james.marsahll@uhs.sa.edu.au or add me on league and message me also you can write in the comments to this post.
example
Name:
rank:
Main role/Main roles:
Champ pool:
where you from:

replies.body:
Name: Seth or The Sethoridian
Rank: B5 but i play with a plat and she says im actually good but i don't play ranked USUALLY but in s6 im gonna play alot!!!
Main Role/ Main Roles: i can play most roles but excel at   MID JG TOP SUPPORT. but i can still ADC and i mostly play top/jungle!
Champ Pool: like a third of the champs i'll list as many as i can XD
{{champion:12}} {{champion:32}} {{champion:1}} {{champion:22}} {{champion:31}} {{champion:122}} {{champion:36}} {{champion:28}} {{champion:9}} {{champion:41}} {{champion:86}} {{champion:120}} {{champion:74}} {{champion:40}} {{champion:24}} {{champion:222}} {{champion:30}} {{champion:55}} {{champion:10}} {{champion:121}} {{champion:203}} {{champion:96}} {{champion:7}} {{champion:54}} {{champion:11}} {{champion:25}} {{champion:75}} {{champion:111}} {{champion:76}} {{champion:20}} {{champion:80}} {{champion:78}} {{champion:33}} {{champion:107}} {{champion:92}} {{champion:13}} {{champion:35}} {{champion:98}} {{champion:27}} {{champion:14}} {{champion:15}} {{champion:37}} {{champion:16}} {{champion:223}} {{champion:17}} {{champion:23}} {{champion:4}} {{champion:77}} {{champion:45}} {{champion:19}} {{champion:5}} {{champion:157}} {{champion:26}} {{champion:238}}  sigh i think i have a few more actually XDXDXD but yeah :P and im from BRIZZY QLD AUSTRALIA (or close to it :P){{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

rank does not matter to me. you can play, just reminding you we will start next season doe (practicing during preseason). Just give me times and dates you prefer also add me so i can let you know when we start. 

Kankuro

:3 ez im happy to im onlyable toplay during the weekend for the next 3 weeks as im in year 11 and its the end of the term and exam block is here XD but my holidays at the moment are free as hell :D
*EDIT*
there's a pre-season tournament coming up that's free maybe we could get a few friend or more people from this thread and maybe see how our skills stack up?? (20th of november) 
http://events.oce.leagueoflegends.com/events/155169#info

Let me know if you have space left, else I am also planning on creating a ranked team and maybe we can work it out together. Cheers
add me, at kankuro we need at top laner
